thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 3 of 171
thread.title: Janet O'Donoghue

author: Janet O'Donoghue
title: Janet O'Donoghue
text:
We were forever going on trips away, and leaving our pets (cat, rabbit and budgie) with a local cattery....but having to make arrangements to drop them the day before leaving and pick up the day after returning.
We were leaving empty a large house in a lovely location, which seemed such a wasted opportunity.
Since signing up to Trusted House-sitters, we have had four trips away, safe in the knowledge that our pets have had a great time, and our house has been looked after and cared for in our absence. We would recommend the site and system to anyone.
